<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon of S. Cyprian made on the Lordes prayer that is to wytte, the Paternoster. De Dominica oratione. English Cyprian, Saint, Bishop of Carthage. Paynell, Thomas.
[72] p.
In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress.], [Londini : An. M.D.XXXIX. [1539]
A translation of: De Dominica oratione. The translator's name, Thomas Paynell, appears on A1v. Printer's name and place of publication from colophon. Signatures: A-D E⁴. Running title reads: A sermon of S. Cyp. on the Pater nost. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
